sentences.sContent: The first time I saw Diana I was mesmerized by her beauty.
sentences.sCn: 我第一次见到戴安娜就被她的美貌迷住了。

synos.tran: 施催眠术；迷住；以魅力迫使

words.tran: 施催眠术，迷住，迷惑（mesmerize的过去式）
施以催眠术；使…入迷；使…目瞪口呆

trans.tranCn: 施催眠术； 使入迷， 迷住
trans.tranOther: if you are mesmerized by someone or something, you cannot stop watching them or listening to them because they are so attractive or have such a powerful effect
